content: adult fair isle hat yarnsmiths merino aran superwash 82yrds/75m 1 75oz/50g teal 4230 a - 1 ball copper 4076 b - 1 ball claret red 4090 c - 1 ball anthracite grey 4002 d - 1 ball white 4040 e - 1 ball circular knitting needle sizes 4 5mm and 5 0mm 40cm long 4 each 5mm dpns gauge 18 sts x 25 row = 4 / 10cm in stocking stitch on 5mm needles
